pack_description: Perfect for gatherings with friends or family, these questions will spark fun discussions and laughter, making any occasion more enjoyable.
questions: What's your biggest pet peeve?
Complement a person in the room.
Pick one person in the room. What's your favorite thing about them?
Pick one person in the room and make a 30-second skit together. Perform it for the group.
What would you do if you could become invisible for a day?
What's your biggest irrational fear?
Have you ever stolen something? What was it?
Imitate someone else in the room.
Change your profile picture on any social media platform to someone else in the room.
Share your most embarrassing moment.
What's your favorite family tradition?
Who is your celebrity crush?
Tell us about your first kiss.
What's your dream job?
If you could travel anywhere right now, where would you go?
What's your favorite movie of all time?
Who is the messiest person you know?
What's the most valuable lesson you've learned?
If you could have any superpower, what would it be?
Do you believe in ghosts?
Describe your perfect day.
If you won the lottery tomorrow, what's the first thing you would do?
What was the last thing you searched for on your phone?
If you could switch lives with anyone in the room for a day, who would it be?
What's your favorite hobby?
If you could be a character in any film or TV show, who would you be and why?
Do you have any hidden talents?
What's your go-to karaoke song?
Describe yourself using only three words.

What's your favorite type of cuisine?

What's the most difficult decision you've ever had to make?

What's your favorite ice cream flavor?

Do you have any strange phobias?
If you could instantly master any skill, what would it be?
What's the most useless talent you have?

Do you have a nickname? What's the story behind it?
What's your favorite board game?
If you could time travel, where and when would you go?
Do you believe in aliens?
If you could be famous for one thing, what would it be?
What's the most adventurous thing you want to do before you die?
What's your earliest memory?
If you could donate a million dollars to any cause, what would it be?
What's the most valuable thing you own?
Who in your life has influenced you the most?
If you were to go on a talent show, what would your talent be?
What's your favorite type of music?
Do you think pineapple belongs on pizza?

What's the one thing you could talk about forever?

What's the first thing you'd do in a zombie apocalypse?
When was the last time you lied & what was it?
Pick one person in the room. What's your favorite thing about them?
Take a selfie with someone's leg and post it to one of your stories on a social media platform with no context.
Describe your worst date ever.
What's the most embarrassing song you know all the lyrics to?

Describe your most recent dream.

What's your guilty pleasure TV show?

What's the most rebellious thing you've ever done?
What's the most embarrassing thing you've ever Googled?
Describe your perfect partner.
What's the weirdest thing you find attractive in a person?

Text 'I love you' to a random number and see if you get a response.
Post a face reveal on your Instagram story as serious as possible.
